DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{"padding":"37px 19px 0px 27px"},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":23,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select u.Oid,
	   u.[Name] as 'User',
       u.Oid as UserId,
	   u.[Name] as UserName,
       u.HasImage as UserHasImage,
	   u.AdUserName, 
	   c.[Name] as Company,
       c.[Oid] as CompanyId,
	   d.[Name] as Department,
       d.[Oid] as DepartmentId,
        u.CreatedOn as CreatedOn,
        u.ModifiedOn as ModifiedOn,
        u1.Name as CreatedByName,
        u2.Name as ModifiedByName,
        u1.Oid as CreatedById,
        u2.Oid as ModifiedById,
        u1.HasImage as CreatedByHasImage,
        u2.HasImage as ModifiedByHasImage
From [User] u
	INNER JOIN [User] u1 on u1.Oid = u.CreatedBy 
	INNER JOIN [User] u2 on u2.Oid = u.ModifiedBy,
    Company c, 
    Department d  
where u.Company = c.Oid and u.Department = d.Oid","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
